home.innovate_in_the_heart_of_africa: INNOVATE IN THE HEART OF AFRICA
home.welcome_to_vitib: Welcome to VITIB - Information Technology and Biotechnology Village,
home.excellence_in_innovation_and_techno: a center of excellence dedicated to innovation and technological development in Ivory Coast.
home.located_in_the_heart_of_africa: Located in the heart of Africa, in Ivory Coast, VITIB is a technological free zone which
home.vitib_is_a_technology_free_zone: provides an environment conducive to the growth of technology companies.
home.proud_to_offer_dynamic_ecosystem: We are proud to offer a dynamic ecosystem, where businesses can thrive thanks to attractive tax and regulatory benefits, as well as state-of-the-art infrastructure.VITIB offers modern office space, state-of-the-art research laboratories, high-speed Internet connectivity and much more.
home.zbtic_is_a_territory_with_favorable: The ZBTIC is a territory in which advantageous tax and customs policies apply. Ivorian legislation relating to the ZBTIC (law no. 429-2004 of August 30, 2004) grants a monopoly on the management, operation, development and promotion of the Village de l'Innovation Technologique to the company VITIB S.A. In turn, VITIB S.A. has designed a Master Plan in line with smart city status.
about.vision: Together, let's build the Smart City N°1 in Africa
about.director_general_message:
Welcome to the website of the Village of Information Technologies and Biotechnology (VITIB SA).
This site is a platform for quality information on our missions and our objectives.
VITIB SA aims to be an instrument for the development of Côte d'Ivoire, particularly in the areas of Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) as well as Biotechnology, in accordance with the vision of His Excellency Alassane OUATTARA, President
Our ambition is to be a powerful vector for the development of our country and the sub-region.
Your opinions are of great interest to us and will be an additional source of motivation for us to qualitatively enrich our offers and services;
Sincerely.
about.mission.title: Missions
about.mission.describe:
Our vision is to become a hub of innovation and technological development that catalyzes economic growth, encourages entrepreneurship and transforms the area into an internationally renowned regional technology hub.
This vision includes some key elements which are:
about.mission.content:
1. State-of-the-art infrastructure:

A techno pole zone should have modern infrastructure, such as research centers, laboratories, collaborative workspaces and cutting-edge technological equipment.
This would facilitate the development and implementation of new technologies.

2. Collaboration between actors:

A strong vision would be to promote collaboration between businesses, universities, research centers and local governments.
By promoting strategic partnerships, knowledge exchanges and joint initiatives, we can stimulate innovation and accelerate technological development.

3. Training and talent development:

A techno-pole zone should be committed to training and developing a qualified workforce.
This can be achieved by establishing specialized training programs, providing continuous learning opportunities, and fostering interactions between students, researchers, and industry professionals.
about.value.title: Values
about.value.content:
4. Support for entrepreneurship:

Encouraging entrepreneurship and the creation of startups is essential to stimulate innovation.
A vision for a techno pole zone could include business incubators, investment funds,
acceleration programs and financial support for entrepreneurs to encourage the emergence of new technological companies.

5. Sustainability and social responsibility:

A modern vision for a techno-pole zone should integrate principles of environmental sustainability and social responsibility.
It is important to adopt environmentally friendly practices,
to promote clean energy and encourage the development of technological solutions that help solve social and environmental challenges.

6. Brand image and reputation:

Being associated with VITIB Technopolis, a flagship technology and innovation project in Cote d'Ivoire, can enhance your company's brand and reputation.
It demonstrates your commitment to innovation, technological progress and sustainability, which can attract investors, partners and customers.
opportunity.title: INVEST IN VITB
opportunity.future_projects_warehouses_d: This project aims to create warehouse-type infrastructures, capable of housing assembly lines for various ICT products, as well as additional storage spaces for manufacturers and ZBTIC users.
opportunity.promotion_block_a_descriptio: This real estate development must take into account a specific program for residents carried out free of charge for VITIB S.A. The rest of the plot (80%) can be marketed.
opportunity.future_projects.office_build: This zone includes an ICT-soft economic zone, intended to accommodate companies working in the ICT sector.
opportunity.business_hotels_description: Neighboring the future Congress center of the technology park, this business hotel will offer an accommodation solution to various experts, executives and visitors from companies operating on the ZBTIC site.
opportunity.university_description: The Technological Innovation Village aims to be the center of technological thinking in West Africa.
opportunity.international_medical_clinic: A medical clinic of international stature corresponding to international standards, aims to offer at least general medical services and specialized services to ZBTIC customers and workers.
opportunity_section_subtitle: Invest on its opportunities in a unique location
installer.title: HOW TO GET STARTED
installer.eligibility_prerequisites_subt: Benefit from the ZBTIC regime is subject to obtaining approval issued by the EPE (VITIB S.A).
installer.eligibility_prerequisites_bank: Banks and financial establishments supporting investments made in the Free Zone.
installer.eligibility_prerequisites_viti: VITIB also offers investment opportunities in BOO and BOT real estate on 180 Ha under development, with the creation of a new city in mind.VITIB is looking for technical and financial partners in PPP mode to finance and implement urban projects in the Grand-Bassam Free Zone. In addition, a 62-hectare residential and commercial zone has been set aside to provide local housing solutions for nearly 20,000 ZBTIC employees.

of IT products

energy, environment, industry, mines)
installer.value-added_content:
Value-added services are services where suppliers add value
to the information provided by the customer by improving its form or content or by providing for its storage and retrieval.
installer.activities_accompanying_conten: In addition to these privileged activities, ZBTIC hosts a range of support services:
installer.join_us_content:
An exceptional opportunity at VITIB.
Benefit from tax advantages, state-of-the-art infrastructure and a dynamic ecosystem conducive to innovation. Immerse your company in a strategic and prosperous environment, ready to welcome the most promising technology companies.
installer.join_us_vision: Join us today and transform the future of your business in the heart of Africa.
installer.opportunity_list: Consult the list of investment opportunities (invest in VITIB)
